Faculty and Staff Survey on Campus Culture Is Still Open
Deadline extended to Jan. 7.
Facebook
Twitter
Email
Jan 06, 2022
— Atlanta, GA
As a continuation of Georgia Tech’s focus on
Living Our Values Every Day (L.O.V.E. GT) , the Institute is soliciting feedback on how well we are demonstrating the behaviors and practices set forth by our stated
values . Survey input from faculty and staff will help identify the areas within our culture where we are succeeding as well as where there are opportunities for improvement. Students will be surveyed in mid-January.
The survey will take no more than 10 – 15 minutes, and all responses will remain anonymous. It will be accessible until the close of business on Friday, Jan. 7.
Take the survey .
